name: LightLine
description:
Story

The small ball wants to get to the end. Help him in this. There are many obstacles along the way, but you shouldn't give up. Collect coins and buy new skins for It. Let your character draw a lot of wavy lines.

Description

The game has a small line that moves straight. Your goal is to collect as many coins as possible and buy new skins. Enjoy nice music and gameplay. 

Details

The game is made on Godot version 3.2. At the moment, all skins are free. Created by To Sky Games.

Other

We will be very grateful if you help our studio and make a donation or write a comment.
